Type.BattleDialog: Get yourselves ready. Just don’t get impatient.
Don’t be a dead weight. You know this one, right?
Don’t stand still like a moron! Can’t you remember that focus is key?
That was pathetic for an Urban Nightmare…
No way… How could I…
It seems we’ll have to pay the price to earn this information.
Get up! You wanna meet the same fate, or what?
…I guess they won’t give it away easily.
Don’t ease up.
Well, “ordeal” might have been too pompous a word to describe this…
That was easy. Won’t you quicken your pace and get your part of the job done already?
We can get precious intel on Wings this way, ye?
I could expect a big promotion if this succeeds.
Even if it’s valuable intel… Is it worth risking our lives over…?
Maybe Section 3 will get a huge backing if things go well?
Let’s focus on the battle for now…
I hope this’ll convince the Association to up our funding…
Time to head back and finish the boring part.
We’ll type up the report later… I’m knackered.
I didn’t… plan to die like this.
I don’t wanna die… Coming here was a mistake…!
This was a foolhardy plan…
…Guess they won’t just hand it over for free.
They just played their part to the fullest.
How long do I have to keep this up until I get a new lease on life?
You came for me too recklessly.
What a complacent fellow.
This will make the mission easier.
